name: Sneak ball
description:
The sneak ball is a hyper-casual game with a challenging pattern in a reptile motion when you press the ball then the ball will move in a random, reptile motion so while pressing In such a way that you can cross the pattern and collect the white ball to increase the high score and challenge your friends and enjoy!!

It's different from what you would see in this game, and break the high score.

Collect the white balls and be safe from the blocks and press the block in such a way that you can clear the blocks and make a high score !!!
